original_title: Committee to conduct threat assessments on presidential candidates, ex-Presidents
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has submitted a Cabinet paper proposing the appointment of a committee to conduct threat assessments on the presidential candidates and former Presidents and to ensure the required security for them.
The Cabinet paper also proposes to appoint a Deputy Inspector General of Police (DIG) to oversee these security arrangements.
The decision has been taken in view of the forthcoming Presidential Election, and to ensure the safety of the candidates, according to the President’s Media Division (PMD).
